nodes.description: This trigger node listens for incoming emails containing meeting minutes.

parameters.prompt:
Summarize the following meeting minutes. Provide a JSON object with these properties:
- summary: (a concise summary of the meeting in 3-4 sentences)
- keyPoints: (an array of up to 5 key points discussed in the meeting)
- actionItems: (an array of action items or tasks assigned during the meeting)
- attendees: (an array of attendee names and titles as mentioned in the minutes)
- attendeesToCC: (an array of attendee emails as mentioned in the minutes)

Meeting Subject: {{receiveMeetingMinutes.subject}}
Meeting Minutes:
{{receiveMeetingMinutes.body}}

Return ONLY the JSON object without any additional text.

nodes.description: This action node uses an AI model to summarize the meeting minutes.
This utility node formats the summary into an HTML structure with basic styling.
This action node sends the formatted summary to all attendees.
This utility node logs the meeting summary data for future reference and reporting.
This utility node displays a label for the Meeting Minutes Summarizer workflow.
